content: add some charm to your outfit by adding this stylish crochet crossbody bag this crochet bag pattern is cute and simple to make it s the perfect little bag to tow around if you just want to bring the necessities details - pattern is written in standard us terms - basic knowledge of beginner stitches is needed to make this pattern - bag straps are interchangeable - size of bag 8 1/2 wide x 8 1/2″ long - pattern includes step-by-step photos and a guided video tutorial materials needed - 2 skeins of hobby lobby yarn bee cotton et lin in the color parchment weight 4/ 3 5oz 180 yds a total of 360 yards or you can use another worsted weight yarn - 5 0 mm h crochet hook - stitch marker optional - 2 swivel hooks - darning needle - scissors
